==Interactables==
===Advertisement Board===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Before finishing [[Radiant Sakura]])
::'''Ogura Textiles & Kimonos Bulletin Board:''' I apologize, but imported [[Silk Flower]]s are currently out of stock due to the [[Sakoku Decree]].
::'''Ogura Textiles & Kimonos Bulletin Board:''' Please let us know in advance if you want to place any custom orders. We will take note and start work as soon as the silk is back in stock.
;(After finishing [[Radiant Sakura]])
::'''Ogura Textiles & Kimonos Bulletin Board:''' Our store is currently negotiating with merchants, the supply of Silk Flowers will be resumed soon.
::'''Ogura Textiles & Kimonos Bulletin Board:''' Please do not worry &mdash; you can take advance orders from us, and work will begin in good order once the silks arrive.
{{Dialogue End}}
